pages.text: He jhukalelya netranni kabarimadhuna asa prakare uthuna ubhe rahatila ki janu itastatah pasaralela tola thava
Pukaranaryakade dhavata jata asatila ani kaphira mhanatila ki ha divasa tara motha kathina ahe
Tyancyapurvi nuhacya janasamuhanehi amacya dasala khote tharavile hote. Ani veda darsavuna jhidakarale hote
Tevha tyane apalya palanakartyajavala du'a (prarthana) keli ki mi tavadita sapadalelo ahe. Tu majhi madata kara
Tevha amhi akasace daravaje musaladhara pavasane ughadale
Ani jaminituna jhare pravahita kele, tevha tya karyasathi je bhagyata lihile gele hote, (doghehi) pani ekatrita jhale
Ani amhi tyala asa nauketa cadhavile, ji takte ani mekha asaleli hoti
Ji amacya dolyansamora calata hoti. Ha mobadala tyacyatarphe, jyaca inkara kela gela hota
Ani nihsansaya, amhi ya ghatanela nisani banavuna baki rakhale tevha ahe koni bodha grahana karanara
Tevha (sanga) kasa hota majha prakopa ani majhi bhayapurna tambi
Ani nihsansaya, amhi kura'anala samajanyakarita sope kele ahe1 tevha ahe koni bodha grahana karanara
Adacya janasamuhanehi khote tharavile tevha kasa hota majha azaba ani majhi bhayapurna tambi
Amhi tyancyavara satata vegane vahanari hava (vadali vara) eka satatacya asubha divasi pathavili
Ji lokanna ucaluna apatata hoti, janu mulasakata ukhadalele khajurice vrksa aheta
Tevha kasa hota majha prakopa ani majhe bhayabhita karane
Ani nihsansaya, amhi kura'ananala bodhapraptikarita sope kele ahe tevha ahe koni bodha grahana karanara
Samudacya janasamuhane (hi) khabaradara karanaryanna khote tharavile
Ani mhanale ki, kaya amacyapaikica eka manasace amhi anusarana karu lagave? Maga tara amhi avasya va'itapanata ani vedepanata padalele asu
Kaya amha sarvammadhuna phakta tyacyavaraca vahayi (prakasana) avatarita keli geli? Tevha to khotarada, ghamendi ahe
Ata sarva januna ghetila ki udya kona khotarada va ghamendi hota
Nihsansaya, amhi tyancya kasotikarita sandani pathavu tevha (he svaleha!) Tumhi tyanci pratiksa kara ani dhira sanyama rakha
